title: 7/22/21: FBI's Plot Exposed, Fauci vs Rand Paul, Ben & Jerry's, NSO Spyware Abuses, Frito-Lay Workers, Bezos's Space Trip, NPR Smears, Big Tech Dominance, and More!

itunes:title: 7/22/21: FBI's Plot Exposed, Fauci vs Rand Paul, Ben & Jerry's, NSO Spyware Abuses, Frito-Lay Workers, Bezos's Space Trip, NPR Smears, Big Tech Dominance, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar talk about the FBI orchestrating the Gov. Whitmer kidnapping plot, a shouting match between Dr. Fauci & Sen. Rand Paul, Israel's conflict with Ben & Jerry's, explosive private spyware abuses, Frito-Lay workers fighting inhumane conditions, Jeff Bezos's trip to space, the media's newest smear, big tech's power, and more!
